attributes.action: Provide funding for nature reserves in towns
attributes.additional_details: I want the Government to do this in towns also to help people, wild escape areas are proven to help people with mental health problems but can't get outside of towns. Children and schools will also benefit from visiting these places which are hard to reach by foot. All volunteers from every age or walks of life can help maintain pathways, planting and supervising the types of insects we are attracting, helping bring back endangered species. They should be open parks for all creatures to enjoy. Greener towns.
attributes.background: Start funding for a plots of nature reserves inside towns, some parks could be used to help the population of our native insects, birds, hedgehogs and many other species that are being endangered. There should be no pesticides used.

departments.name: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
